src.utils package

Submodules

src.utils.limiter module

src.utils.limiter.limiter = <slowapi.extension.Limiter object>

This module initializes the rate limiter for the FastAPI application.

It uses slowapi.Limiter to restrict the number of requests from each client based on their IP address.

src.utils.limiter.limiter

A rate limiter instance using the remote IP address as the key.

Type:

Limiter
